description.value:
This affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor the damage from it healed, until successfully treated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Affliction] or a similar effect; the affliction can then be removed as a normal disease. A creature that dies from cold damage while cursed with blackfrost rises as a blackfrost dead after 24 hours. Blackfrost has a counteract rank of 10.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27]

Stage 1 @Damage[4d6[cold]] (1 minute)

Stage 2 weakness to cold 5 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 weakness to cold 10 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} (1 day)

publication.title: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
